title: Caitlyn Statue in Merch Store
body: Hi, just wondering if this statue will be sold at any stores in Australia similar to the current merch being sold at Gametraders. I really like the statue but the USD-AUD conversion along with the shipping cost is making it too expensive.

replies.body:
Hey there,

As far as I'm aware the only league related merch sold in stores are the new "League of Legends Funko Pop-Vinyl Figures".

No other merchandise related to league has been officially sold in stores such as EB Games, gametraders, etc.

Thank you for the reply. I was just wondering if it would eventually be sold at Gametraders like other merch (not including the Pop Vinyls) http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/league-merch-coming-gametraders
